The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\julio\\Desktop\\Projeto\\cada.serviceRawFile:
service: cadastro-cliente

frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: sa-east-1
  stage: dev
  environment:
    CLIENT_TABLE: ${self:service}-clients-${self:provider.stage}
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - dynamodb:PutItem
        - dynamodb:GetItem
        - dynamodb:UpdateItem
        - dynamodb:DeleteItem
        - dynamodb:Scan
      Resource:
        - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.CLIENT_TABLE}

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

functions:
  createClient:
    handler: dist/interfaces/http/createClientHandler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /clients
          method: post

  getClient:
    handler: dist/interfaces/http/getClientHandler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /clients/{id}
          method: get

  updateClient:
    handler: dist/interfaces/http/updateClientHandler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /clients/{id}
          method: put

  deleteClient:
    handler: dist/interfaces/http/deleteClientHandler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /clients/{id}
          method: delete

  listClients:
    handler: dist/interfaces/http/listClientsHandler.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /clients
          method: get

resources:
  Resources:
    ClientTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.CLIENT_TABLE}
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
